FAQ

Will there be a presale ?

There won't be any whitelist/presale. We reserved 300 Mayanpunk for giveaway winners and marketing purposes.

How do you support the Community ?

We share 25% of our income from secondary sales and from MayanPunk with our holders. If MayanDAO decides to put these funds to a different use, such as donations to organizations, it'll happen.

Is there any delay in reveal ?

No, the reveal will be instant. You won't have to wait to meet your cute and thug MayanPunk.

What is Minting?

Minting is the act of claiming ownership on a specific NFT for the very first time. The action of minting involves sending the correct amount of ETH to the NFT's “Smart Contract” (which you can think of as the registry for the specific NFT collection), the Smart Contract in turn will “mint” a new item in the collection and set the buyer's wallet address as the owner of that item. The MayanPunk smart contract is limited to 10,000 Mayans, so grab yours ASAP!

How much does it cost to mint 1 MayanPunk?

Mayans are priced in ETH and cost 0.05ETH each.

How can I sell My NFT?

After an NFT is minted, it can be traded freely by its current owner and there are no costs involved except Ethereum transaction fees. However, since such trading on Ethereum requires mutual trust, marketplaces like OpenSea were developed and solved that problem. OpenSea is the largest NFT marketplace and the platform of choice for most collectors who wish to buy or sell. Trading on OpenSea involves additional fees for the seller.

Whats your story ?

Our story begins with 10,000 unique Mayans- AKA MayanPunk - that have managed to unshackle themselves from bured ancient history. These unique Mayans are algorithmically developed using 800 MayanGlyphs, these are decoded mayan scripts.

How can I buy a MayanPunk ?

You will need to have MetaMask installed and set up (If you don't know what MetaMask is or how to install it, please visit https://metamask.io for instructions). In order to buy, connect with your wallet and use the minting interface to select how many donuts you want to get. Click the shiny mint button, approve the transaction on MetaMask and watch Mayans comming into your wallet! You can buy up to 20 MayanPunk's in a single transaction. Please make sure you have enough ETH in your wallet for the desired amount of donuts (see pricing above) and for some fees - AKA Gas - (which are charged by the Ethereum network).

How can I mint from mobile?

You will need to use the MetaMask App Browser and connect your wallet to mint Mayans on our website.

How can I see my MayanPunk ?

After you use the site to mint, and once the transaction is confirmed, your newly adopted MAyanPunk will show up here. Since MayanPunk is an ERC721 compliant NFT, they will be viewable/tradeable on all major platforms.

Tell about the art ?

Each MaynPunk is created randomly from a pool of 800 hand-drawn traits. In The generative algorithm ensures that all Mayans are unique and none has the same set of traits. Some traits are “rarer” than others but all of them are meticulously illustrated.

How is the Art preserved ?

The art will be saved on both IPFS and Arweave and the Smart contract will keep track of both. Once we hit the 50% sold mark, we will begin uploading the art in full resolution to both IPFS and Arweave

What is your vision?

Our vision is to create and develop Maya metaverse - which is in its core a fun Onchain DeFi platform and a home for all Mayans and there arts. We intially planned to launch Mayans as an Onchain art, since all our mayanpunks are made as SVG only, and customised using BoxySVG. We sought to deploy MayanPunk onChain ASAP. That's our primary vision as of now.

Reserve Mayans

We will reserve up to 300 Mayans for giveaways, contests, marketing and some for the team.

Where can I get Support

We are here to support you on ourDiscord
